alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 12:17PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chase, northwestern Butler and southeastern Marion Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1217 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Potwin, or 11 miles north of El Dorado, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Burns, Bazaar, Matfield Green, Cedar Point, Wonsevu, El Dorado Lake and El Dorado State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 75 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
